name: auto-research
title: 自动研究
author: canidae
description: 按 shift+T 显示界面，可按以下优先级自动研究科技：最少科技包种类的科技（可禁用），优先研究的科技，优先研究科技的前置科技，最少消耗的科技（消耗 = 科技包数 * 能量）。
description_original: Automates research. Show GUI with Shift+T (customizable). Chooses research in the following order: Fewest types of science packs (can be disabled), prioritized technologies, prerequisites for prioritized technologies, least effort technologies (effort = science packs * energy).
